name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: A government initiative providing direct income support of ₹6,000 per year to small and marginal farmers. The scheme aims to ensure financial stability for agricultural households, reducing dependency on informal loans. Farmers receive payments in three equal installments directly into their bank accounts.

name: PM Awas Yojana (Urban)
description: A housing scheme targeting urban poor, offering financial assistance for affordable housing. The scheme provides interest subsidies on home loans and encourages the construction of houses equipped with basic amenities. It covers Economically Weaker Sections (EWS), Lower Income Groups (LIG), and Middle Income Groups (MIG).

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: A labor law ensuring 100 days of wage employment per year to rural households. It aims to provide economic security by guaranteeing minimum wages for manual work and promotes sustainable development by funding labor-intensive projects in rural areas, such as road construction and irrigation facilities.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: A welfare scheme that provides free LPG gas connections to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households. This initiative aims to replace unhealthy traditional cooking methods with clean fuel, improving indoor air quality and health outcomes for women and children in rural areas.

name: National Fellowship for SC Students
description: A government initiative to provide financial support to Scheduled Caste (SC) students pursuing research degrees such as M.Phil. and Ph.D. The program covers tuition fees, study grants, and research assistance, encouraging participation in higher education among SC communities.

name: Rajasthan Widow Pension Scheme
description: A state-level pension scheme providing financial support to widows in Rajasthan.

name: Karnataka SC/ST Entrepreneur Support Scheme
description: Financial assistance and subsidized loans for SC/ST entrepreneurs in Karnataka.

name: Tamil Nadu Girl Child Protection Scheme
description: Financial support for female children from low-income families in Tamil Nadu.

name: Punjab Small Farmer Assistance Scheme
description: Financial aid for small and marginal farmers in Punjab.

name: Uttar Pradesh Minority Scholarship Scheme
description: Scholarship for minority students in Uttar Pradesh pursuing higher education.

name: West Bengal Kanyashree Prakalpa
description: A scheme providing financial assistance to female students in West Bengal.

name: Maharashtra Tribal Welfare Housing Scheme
description: Housing assistance for tribal families in Maharashtra.

name: Madhya Pradesh Ladli Laxmi Yojana
description: Financial aid for the education and welfare of girl children in Madhya Pradesh.

name: Bihar Kushal Yuva Program
description: A skill development program for unemployed youth in Bihar.

name: Odisha Mission Shakti
description: Financial aid and skill training for women entrepreneurs in Odisha.

name: Haryana SC Free Coaching Scheme
description: Coaching support for Scheduled Caste students in Haryana preparing for competitive exams.

name: Gujarat Farmer Solar Pump Subsidy Scheme
description: Subsidized solar pumps for small and marginal farmers in Gujarat.

name: Kerala Women Empowerment Loan Scheme
description: Low-interest loans for women entrepreneurs in Kerala.

name: Assam Tea Garden Worker Welfare Scheme
description: Health and education benefits for tea garden workers in Assam.

name: Jharkhand PVTG Development Program
description: Livelihood support for Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Groups (PVTGs) in Jharkhand.

name: Chhattisgarh Dairy Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
description: Support for dairy farmers in Chhattisgarh.

name: Goa Startup Promotion Scheme
description: Financial aid for startups in Goa.

name: Sikkim Organic Farming Subsidy
description: Support for organic farmers in Sikkim.
